name: s3-cache-action
description: A custom task created to cache files to S3
author: NHS Digitial

inputs.name: key
inputs.label: S3 Key
inputs.helpMarkDown: A key that will be hashed and used for S3 Cache Entry

inputs.name: location
inputs.label: Location
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path to file or folder to be cached

inputs.name: bucket
inputs.label: Bucket
inputs.helpMarkDown: Name of S3 bucket item will be cached in

inputs.name: alias
inputs.label: Cache alias
inputs.helpMarkDown: An optional alias to the cache to control the name of the output variable.

inputs.name: cacheHitVar
inputs.label: Cache Hit variable name
inputs.helpMarkDown: An optional variable in which to store the result of a cache hit / miss.

inputs.name: workingDirectory
inputs.label: Working Directory
inputs.helpMarkDown: Optional working directory for evaluating the cache key segments / location.
